alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 6:12AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, Upson, Talbot and eastern Harris Counties through 645 AM EST... At 612 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was centered near Pine Mountain Valley, or just east of Hamilton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Woodland, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Shiloh, Atwater, Cataula, Baughville, Flint Hill, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Sunnyside, Prattsburg, Hannahs Mill and Big Lazer Creek Wma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for west central Georgia.
